info.kapable.utils.owanotifier

Class OwaNotifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • info.kapable.utils.owanotifier.OwaNotifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer

    public class OwaNotifier
extends Observable
implements Observer
    OwaNotifier main class - Load config - start oauth2 client daemon - main loop to check new mail
    Author:
    Mathieu GOULIN

      • setMute

        public static void setMute(boolean value)
        Update mute status in Java/Prefs, this state is saving and restoring at OwaNotifier boot

        Throws:
        com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParseException - In case of bad response fron api
